title: Teemo's cute and that's why every ones hates him
body: Teemo's so cute he does not need balance

replies.body:
There's a reason there are so many Teemo hats in the audience during LCS.  Everybody loves him, but only a few will admit it.
Some think hating on Teemo is cool, following some sort of anti-Teemo cult trend. But even as they spew their hatred in-game and on the forums, we know of the love and adoration they hold in their hearts for our little Yordle.
I pray to teemo every night. Some times when I close my eye's at night I can hear the cry's of people getting shroomed.
I so tots agree he's so adorbs and i wuv da wittle fwuffball oh yes i do oh yes i do!
All the Yordles are cute. Teemo is hated because he is frustrating to play against. Especially when he spams his laugh.

Remember folks, downvote the main post out of hatred for teemo while continuing to upvote every response supporting it, because deep down, you know it's true. (Seriously... that's what's happening right now. It's amazing. Even I joined the bandwagon (sorry Lockheart!))

The only fun thing about Teemo for anyone is making fun of him and watching him die.

{{item:3751}}{{champion:17}}{{item:3751}}

Teemo is hated because he is incredibly annoying to play against because of his mushrooms scattered all over the map, and is incredibly annoying to have on your team due to generally lacking team fight presence or late game power.  He's just a giant pile of suck in general and LoL would be much better without him.

Since this is in gameplay and balance: He's hated for a reason: He has very little counterplay. Even if dies, he still has those 10 minute shrooms everywhere that are next to impossible to kill all of them. Then besides the shrooms, he also has his Click-blind which just shuts down adcs so hard (on top of the very high base and ratio.)

My favorite thing is killing Teemos.

The players are pretty much griefers by definition.
Hey OP just said Satan is cute, quickly spray holy water onto this post NAWWWWWWWWW
